Based on the provided text, I'll extract the relevant information into structured JSON. This appears to be a review/policy analysis paper about pension programs rather than an evaluation of a specific intervention.

    "study_design": "Review/Policy Analysis",

Note: This is a review/policy analysis paper discussing pension programs in general, rather than an evaluation of a specific cash transfer or productive assets program. Therefore, many fields are null as they don't apply to this type of paper. The paper discusses non-contributory pensions as a policy approach but doesn't evaluate a specific intervention with cash or asset components.
